ai-patthana23.27:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles means to the extent of the Dhamma.
ai-patthana23.27:0.3_0: Transmigration has no cause or reason.
ai-patthana23.27:1.1_0: Not seeing the cause, not to be given up, nor doing what is skillful.
ai-patthana23.27:1.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana23.27:2.1_0: Not seeing the cause, unskillful qualities should be given up by seeing, not by seeing or by seeing, by cause or condition.
ai-patthana23.27:3.1_0: You shouldn’t give up any cause or reason for developing them.
